body_html:
The queues are always on CPU. The CPU needs to spool, then the heavy duty processing is done on the GPU.

This is more a general question that's probably best answered on stackoverflow. We monitor issues with the tag "tensorflow" there.

body:
The queues are always on CPU. The CPU needs to spool, then the heavy duty processing is done on the GPU.

This is more a general question that's probably best answered on stackoverflow. We monitor issues with the tag "tensorflow" there.
